text: Nicholas Manuel Dondas (26 October 1939 - 9 September 2024) was an Australian politician. He is a member of the Country Liberal Party. He represented the Division of Northern Territory in the House of Representatives from 1996 to 1998. He also served as a member of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly for Casuarina from 1974 to 1994. He was the assembly's speaker from 1989 to 1994. Dondas was born in Perth, Western Australia. He moved to Darwin, Northern Territory before starting his political career. In 1972, Dondas married Cheryl Jones. They had one daughter. Dondas died on 9 September 2024 in Darwin at the age of 84.Former NT politician dies aged 84 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Members of the Australian House of Representatives Category:Order of Australia Category:Politicians from Perth, Western Australia Category:Members of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly Category:Politicians from Darwin, Northern Territory
title: Nick Dondas
